subject: ControlUp alert mail - Machine Down -  Machine DESDN16044.bitzer.biz is down (Machine shut down gracefully.)
body:
This is an automated alert from ControlUp, which you requested to receive using an incident trigger. 

	
One of your managed computers has disconnected from monitoring.


     Organization name: Bitzer


     Trigger name: CITRIX Infrastructur Machines Computer Down Infrastructure <controlup://incidents/CITRIX Infrastructur Machines Computer Down Infrastructure> 


     Computer name: DESDN16044 <controlup://incidents/DESDN16044> 


     Disconnect reason: Machine shut down gracefully.


     Incident timestamp (UTC +2 W. Europe Standard Time): 8/26/2025 3:47:50 PM



In order to configure which e-mail alerts you receive, please open ControlUp and edit the settings for the trigger specified above.
trigger_name: CITRIX Infrastructur Machines Computer Down Infrastructure
